title: Docusaurus Chapter Category Configuration
description: Schema for _category_.json files defining chapter metadata in sidebar

examples: Chapter 1: Introduction to Physical AI and Robotics

position.description: Display order in sidebar (1-10 for chapters)

type.description: Type of link - generated-index creates automatic chapter overview

description.description: Chapter description shown on generated index page

slug.description: Custom URL slug for generated index (optional)

collapsed.description: Whether chapter is collapsed in sidebar by default

icon.description: Optional emoji or icon for visual sidebar

examples.label: Chapter 1: Introduction to Physical AI and Robotics

link.description: Foundational concepts introducing students to the field of physical AI, robotics terminology, and the course structure. Establishes safety-first mindset and ethical awareness from the beginning.
Explores how robots perceive their environment through various sensors. Students learn sensor types, data interpretation, and basic perception algorithms.
